relation: the King of Prussia mall is 5 minutes away.
The food is very good and there are also places near campus to eat.
The dorms are very different but still nice.
Pay your bill as soon as possible.
Eastern University has a very beautiful campus. There is a very welcoming and caring atmosphere about the campus. The food in the cafeteria is surprisingly good.

textAfterTable: Andrew from Milford, DE 07/12/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 2 of 39 Categories Comments Tips for prospective students Eastern has a very strong emphasis on their motto, faith, reason, and justice. Bang for the buck Eastern is a great school and has been called, one of the best Christian College educations money can buy. Am enjoying being here One of the best things about Eastern is that it is full of community. Am learning a lot These teachers don't just teach you what you need to learn, but open up your mind to whole new worlds.
